学園の王子様とハグする話

description.en:
I'm always at the mercy of the prince!?
A slapstick romantic comedy with a handsome girl!
description.pt-br:
Estou sempre à mercê do príncipe!?
Uma comédia romântica pastelão com uma garota linda!

description.en: A god created AOTU World and established the 7 Oracles to rule it on behalf of this god. The poor and rich, enslaved and free, suffering and happiness, destruction and birth: every status is ordained by God. Mortals can only accept, but cannot resist. However, God has given his people the opportunity to change their fate through "AOTU Contest." The contestants use their unique "ability" gifted by the Contest System and inbate wisdom and courage in hopes of winning the competition and becoming the world's ruler.
description.vi:
Thần Sáng Thế của thế giới Ao Đột là một vị thần rất ngẫu hứng.
Ngài tạo ra vô số hành tinh và con dân trong thế giới Ao Đột, nhưng lại cai quản họ một cách tùy ý không theo quy luật --- có hành tinh màu mỡ tươi đẹp, có hành tinh cằn cỗi hoang vu, có con dân được hưởng tự do hạnh phúc, có con dân lại phải chịu sưu thuế nặng nề và lao động khổ sai.
Thần Sáng Thế thành lập ra Bảy Thần Sử, để họ thay mình thực hiện ý chỉ của thần
Thế nhưng cũng không phải là Thần Sáng Thế hoàn toàn không cho con dân mình cơ hội --- nếu như ai muốn thay đổi vận mệnh, thực hiện nguyện vọng của bản thân, vậy thì hãy tham gia "Đại chiến Ao Đột" đi! Các thí sinh sẽ được hệ thống đại chiến ban cho "năng lực đặc biệt", rèn luyện và vận dụng năng lực của riêng mình, không ngừng chiến đấu vượt qua thử thách. Chỉ cần là người chiến thắng sau cùng trong đại chiến Ao Đột là có thể đạt được tất cả, đồng thời được ban cho quyền thay mặt thần cai trị thế giới giống như Bảy Thần Sử.
Tuy nhiên, những điều trên chỉ là quan niệm giả dối, cuộc đấu này đã định sẵn không hề có kẻ chiến thắng. Cho tới khi nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Kim, xuất hiện trên sân đấu.

title.en: Watashi no Ue ni Ukabu "Akuyaki Reijou (Hametsu suru)" tte Nandeshou ka?

altTitles.ja: 私の上に浮かぶ『悪役令嬢(破滅する)』ってなんでしょうか？

altTitles.en: What does "Villainess (Doomed)" floating above my head mean?

description.en:
While attempting to do good deeds, she seemed to have entered the prince's doting route!

Louise, the count's daughter, for some unknown reason, can see letters above people's heads. Written above her own head are the words, "Villainess (doomed)." To change that, Louise aims to be a good-natured noblewoman. However, when she is pressed by Sylvile and tells him truthfully that his descriptor reads, "Love interest: Second Prince (Easy)" his interest is piqued and they become betrothed. Furthermore, he offers her a promise, "To make you feel at ease, I'll show you that I can change my descriptor."

title.en: Akuyaku Reijo no Ani ni Tenseishimashita

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢の兄に転生しました

altTitles.ja-ro: Akuyaku Reijo no Ani ni Tensei Shimashita

description.en:
"Onii-tama?"
Cain, who reincarnated as one of the love interests of an otome game, screamed at the loveliness of his sister, Diana. I can't believe that this angel is going to be a villainess with countless bad ends-- No, there is no way that such a future can exist!
Clenching his fist tightly, he raises his sister into a gentle lady, while also dispelling the darkness held by the love interests in place of the heroine.
Relying on his game knowledge from his previous life and an orphaned chamberlain. Everything for his beloved sister-- The brother's challenge begins now!

title.en: Boku wa Kimitachi wo Shihai suru

altTitles.ja: 僕は君たちを支配する

altTitles.zh-hk: 我將要支配你們的一切

description.en:
Seven women, one man, a suspenseful harem story!

During a class reunion, the school became an enclosed dimension without warning. Yelling and screaming brought no response. 26-year old unemployed Haruka Sato has to survive by cooperating with seven of his former classmates. Soon, the extreme conditions began to eat away at their sanity, and Haruka's hidden desires began to take hold.
description.ru:
Семь женщин и один мужчина - захватывающая история о гареме!

Во время встречи выпускников школа неожиданно превратилась в замкнутое пространство. Крики и вопли ни к чему не привели. 26-летнему безработному Харуке Сато приходится выживать, сотрудничая с семью своими бывшими одноклассниками. Вскоре экстремальные условия начали разъедать их рассудок, и скрытые желания Харуки начали овладевать ими.

---

(Source: [mangalib](https://mangalib.me/boku-wa-kimitachi-wo-shihai-suru?section=info))
description.vi:
Bảy nữ, một nam, câu chuyện hậu cung hồi hộp!
Trong một buổi họp lớp, trường học bỗng nhiên bị một bức tường kỳ lạ bao quanh, không ai có thể thoát ra được. Haruka Sato 26 tuổi thất nghiệp phải sống sót bằng cách hợp tác với bảy người bạn học cũ của mình. Cuối cùng, hoàn cảnh khắc nghiệt bắt đầu ăn mòn tâm trí của họ, và dục vọng thầm kín của Haruka đã lộ ra nanh vuốt
description.es-la: ¡Siete mujeres, un hombre, una historia de harén llena de suspenso! Durante una reunión de ex-alumnos, la escuela se convirtió en una dimensión cerrada sin previo aviso. Los gritos y chillidos no trajeron respuesta. Haruka Sato, desempleado de 26 años, tiene que sobrevivir cooperando con siete de sus antiguas compañeras de clase. Pronto, las condiciones extremas comenzaron a devorar su cordura, y los deseos ocultos de Haruka comenzaron a afianzarse.

altTitles.ja: 王様のプロポーズ

description.en:
The boy’s strongest first love, a witch who rules over the world with her body and strength! Kuozaki Saika. The most powerful witch who has been saving the world from destruction every 3XX hours, and the director of the magicians’ school.

“…I entrust you, my world…”

And then… the first girl the boy ever loved died, entrusting her body and power to Kuga Mushiki.

Instructed by the servant of Saika, Kuga Mushiki is tasked with attending school as his now-deceased lover so that no one finds out the truth…

He’s feared by his classmates and even his teachers. His life becomes even more troublesome as he reunites with his younger sister who asks for counseling about her love for her own brother- him!
We just broke up but we live together? Coming Soon April 27th.
Chapter 7 in Naver's 2023 Rookie Short Story Collection (2023 루키 단편선).

description.en:
"I thought he was a scary and popular alpha, but I've never heard of such an erotic omega!"

Kouta, an alpha college student, finds his tattooed neighbor, Miyanaga, extremely scary. He tries to give the suspicious-looking man a wide berth, but one day he encounters a strong smell that even Kouta, who is insensitive to omega pheromones, could detect――!
Source: MU
description.vi:
“Mình cứ nghĩ cậu ta là một alpha đáng sợ và nổi tiếng, nhưng mình chưa bao giờ nghe nói về một omega khiêu dâm đến thế!”

Kouta, một sinh viên đại học alpha, để ý người hàng xóm đầy hình xăm của mình, Miyanaga, vô cùng đáng sợ. Cậu cố gắng tránh xa tên hàng xóm khó gần có vẻ ngoài khả nghi này, nhưng một ngày nọ, cậu ngửi thấy một mùi nồng nặc mà ngay cả Kouta, người không nhạy cảm với pheromone omega, cũng có thể phát hiện ra――!

description.en: “Please teach us naughty things.” One day, Itsuki is transported to another world, where he is confronted by sisters who serve the goddess. In order to return to the real world, he must give them practical sex education!
What happens when a girl from a quaint and small town meets the son of a Yakuza crime lord? Will she be able to change him for the better or will he continue down the dangerous and violent path?

title.en: Level Reset – Gomi Skill da to Kanchigai Shita Keredo Jitsu wa Tondemonai Cheat Skill Datta

altTitles.ja: レベルリセット ～ゴミスキルだと勘違いしたけれど実はとんでもないチートスキルだった～

description.en:
From childhood, Ragnas had been attracting a lot of attention as a prodigy. When he reached 10 years old, he was to take the “Skill Awakening Ritual” held for all the boys and girls of the country.

Everyone thought that he would receive a legendary skill. But what he received was an unknown skill “Level Reset”. The fatal skill which resets the level to 1, was called “trash” and his life became the life of a slave. But, living such a life, he realized the true possibilities of the skill and decided to leave his house. 

Now, with his cheat skill, he vows to teach those a lesson who looked down on him and begins his journey!

altTitles.th: คุณครูพันธุ์หายาก

altTitles.ja: ジーティーオー

description.en:
Meet Eikichi Onizuka, a 22-year-old ex-biker. He's crude, foul-mouthed, and has a split-second temper. His unlikely goal: to be the Greatest High School Teacher in the World! Of course, the only reason he wants to be a teacher is so he can try to score with the hot students…  
Before he can become a full instructor, he's got to work as a student teacher to earn his credentials. Onizuka may think he's the toughest guy on campus, but when he meets his class full of bullies, blackmailers, and scheming sadists, he'll have to prove it.  
  
---
- **Won the 22nd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen**
description.ru:
22-летний Эйкити Онидзука — бестолочь, бывший член банды... и учитель?
Великий учитель Онидзука вытворяет невозможные, иногда нелепые выходки, пытаясь перехитрить и победить класс 3-4, который намерен выдворить его из школы. В то же время другие препятствия представлены во всей красе, включая лысеющего заместителя директора Хироси Утиямаду, старых врагов со времён его принадлежности к банде и его собственных идиотских методов преподавания. Всё это встаёт на пути у Онидзуки, когда тот пытается помочь ученикам самого проблемного класса школы Сэйрин и своей прекрасной коллеге Адзусе Фуюцуки.

---

(source: shikimori)
description.tr:
Eikichi Onizuka ile tanışın, 22 yaşında eski bir motorcu. Kaba, ağzı bozuk ve anlık öfkesi var. Beklenmedik hedefi: Dünyanın En İyi Lise Öğretmeni olmak! Tabii ki öğretmen olmak istemesinin tek nedeni, seksi öğrencilerle birlikte olabilmek...
Tam bir eğitmen olmadan önce, diplomasını kazanmak için öğrenci öğretmen olarak çalışması gerekmektedir. Onizuka kampüsteki en sert adamın kendisi olduğunu düşünebilir ama zorbalar, şantajcılar ve entrikacı sadistlerle dolu sınıfıyla karşılaştığında bunu kanıtlamak zorunda kalacaktır.
description.uk: Ця історія про те, як колишній член банди «Онібаку» Онідзука Ейкічі, який присвятив усю юність бійкам та розвагам, вирішив стати найкрутішим учителем.

altTitles.ja: 葬送のフリーレン

altTitles.th: คำอธิษฐานในวันที่จากลา Frieren

altTitles.el: Φρίρεν: Πέρα από το Τέλος του Ταξιδιού

altTitles.de: Frieren: Nach dem Ende der Reise

altTitles.es-la: Frieren: Más allá del fin del viaje

description.el: Έχοντας νικήσει τον βασιλιά των δαιμόνων, το ταξίδι μιας δεκαετίας φτάνει στο τέλος του και μια νέα εποχή ειρήνης ξεκινά. Η ζωή όμως συνεχίζεται, ειδικά για την Φρίρεν, πως ως ξωτικό έχει ακόμα αιώνες ζωής μπροστά της. Με τις δεκαετίες να περνάνε, η Φρίρεν έρχεται αντιμέτωπη με την μεταβλητότητα του κόσμου και την παροδικότητα των ανθρώπων. Μετά από μια τελευταία συνάντηση με όλη την παλιά της ομάδα, συνειδητοποιεί ότι ο χρόνος που πέρασε με τους φίλους της ήταν υπερβολικά σύντομος και ότι δεν θα έχει ποτέ την ευκαιρία να τους μάθει καλύτερα. Έρχοντας αντιμέτωπη με την αλήθεια αυτή, η Φρίρεν αποφασίζει να ξεκινήσει ένα ακόμα ταξίδι αλλά αυτή τη φορά έχοντας σκοπό να μάθει το τι σημαίνει να είσαι άνθρωπος.
description.en: The adventure is over but life goes on for an elf mage just beginning to learn what living is all about. Elf mage Frieren and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. With the great struggle over, they all go their separate ways to live a quiet life. But as an elf, Frieren, nearly immortal, will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to terms with the mortality of her friends? How can she find fulfillment in her own life, and can she learn to understand what life means to the humans around her? Frieren begins a new journey to find the answer.
description.es: Frieren es una elfa, y como para todos los de su raza, los años pasan en un suspiro… pero no es así para sus antiguos compañeros de batalla, a los que Frieren verá morir y envejecer. De repente Frieren se da cuenta de que pese a que la vida avanza a un ritmo más lento para ella, las experiencias con sus seres queridos se le escapan de las manos. Un aire nostálgico envuelve a este manga fantástico tan entrañable que ha vendido ya más de 2,5 millones de copias en Japón.
description.fr:
Que deviennent les héros une fois le mal vaincu ?
Dans ce coffret collector : un jeu de 54 cartes entièrement personnalisé aux couleurs de la série et le manga avec une jaquette alternative réversible !

Alors que Frieren et ses compagnons font halte dans la citadelle de Heiß, Stark propose à Fern d'aller en rendez-vous, sur le ton de la plaisanterie... et contre toute attente, la jeune fille accepte ! Sur les conseils de l'elfe, qui n'y connaît pas grand-chose, le guerrier emmène donc son amie faire le tour de la ville, ce qui leur permet de se rapprocher un peu.

Après cette pause bienvenue, les trois aventuriers repartent sur les routes et arrivent au haut-plateau du Nord, une zone extrêmement dangereuse où pullulent aussi bien des monstres coriaces que des démons retors... Parviendront-ils à survivre dans cette région hostile ?
description.es-la: Tras cumplir su misión de derrotar al Rey Demonio, la maga elfo Frieren, el héroe Himmel, el sacerdote Heiter y el guerrero Eisen regresan a casa después de un viaje de una década donde disolverán su grupo y tomarán sus propios caminos. Pero el tiempo pasa de forma distinta para los elfos, Frieren comienza a ser testigo de como sus excompañeros sufren sus estragos y comienzan a morir lentamente y uno a uno. Antes de fallecer, Heiter el sacerdote, le impone a Frieren un aprendiz humana llamada Fern. Llevados por la afición que tiene la alfa por recolectar hechizos mágicos, ambos emprenderán una aventura, llena de magia e introspección, que los llevará a revisitar lugares que había conocido en su anterior travesía, mientras enfrenta el pesar que le causa descubrir todas las posibilidades que ha desperdiciado en su viaje que le hubiesen posibilitado entablar una relación más cercana con sus compañeros ahora fallecidos.
description.zh-hk: 在打倒了魔王的勇者一行人当中，魔法使芙莉莲是精灵，她和其他三人有不一样的地方。 生活在“之后”的世界里，她感受到了什么—— 留下来的人们所编织的葬送与祈祷又意味着什么—— 故事从“冒险的结束”开始。 这是讲述英雄们的活法的，后日谈奇幻作品！

altTitles.ja: エレキシード

description.en:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

Jiwoo es un joven amable que utiliza sus reflejos increíblemente rápidos, como los de un gato, para hacer del mundo un mejor lugar salvando niños o mascotas. Kayden es un agente secreto prófugo que termina encerrado en el cuerpo de un... mmm... gato gordo, peludo y viejo. Juntos y con la ayuda de los superpoderes de Jiwoo y la inteligencia de Kayden lucharán contra las fuerzas que desean que el mal tome control del mundo. Aunque solo lo lograrán si consiguen soportarse lo suficiente para hacerlo.

Кайден - загадочный человек, который словно комета спустился с неба. Весь израненный, почти потерявший последние силы, он решает скрыть свое присутствие - ведь по-другому от погони не уйти. По дороге Кайден встречает обычную дворовую кошку и, почти не думая, решает вселиться в ее тело. Со Чжи У - энергичный и общительный молодой человек из средней школы, который очень любит кошек. Один раз по пути домой он встречает до боли потрепанного кота и берет его к себе домой. Наш У не только добрый, но еще и обладает одной скрытой способностью. Какой же?

altTitles.ja: 鉄風

description.en: It's not easy being good at everything. First-year high school student Natsuo Ishido has always been a gifted athlete, and her ability to easily master every sport has not only bought her a life of boredom, but the resentment of everyone else who has had to work hard for their achievements. Not that Natsuo cares what anyone else thinks. All she longs for is a break from the monotony…for a real challenge worthy of pouring all her efforts into. A rival—an equal—worth beating down, crushing, and demoralizing… That all seems like a pipe dream until a pair of annoyingly peppy transfer students arrive from Brazil and start up a brand-new club that teases the challenge she craves—Mixed Martial Arts. [Kodansha]

title.en: Miss Wolf and Her Fox Sister

altTitles.zh: 狼小姐和她的狐狸妹妹

description.en: [Savage Wolf X Cunning Fox] In the modern therianthrope world, everyone respects the law of the jungle where the strong prey on the weak. Twenty-year-old Yu Wenxi, as a gray wolf therianthrope, stands at the top of the food chain. She has made a name for herself with her fists. She is violent and volatile, always looking down on the weak. Until one day, when her stepsister left a fox cub with her. From then on, the wild wolf turned into a good big dog. She vowed to raise the crybaby cub, train it into a model student, and give it the best that life has to offer. However, the little fox is hiding a wicked heart under the guise of a good girl...

altTitles.ja: ハダカメラ

description.en:
Because he did not pass his college entrance exam, Kagami Kyosuke cannot stay close to Kojo Hikari, the love of his life. So instead he gets a part-time job near her university and buys an old camera since Hikari is passionate for photography. But as it turns out, that camera also has a secret which will get him involved in all sorts of "exciting" and "awkward" situations especially with Botan Oshikiri, his senpai and co-worker. How will Kyosuke's life play out now?  


---
description.id: Karena dia tidak lulus ujian masuk perguruan tinggi, Kagami Kyosuke tidak bisa tinggal dekat dengan Kojo Hikari, cinta dalam hidupnya. Jadi alih-alih dia mendapatkan pekerjaan paruh waktu di dekat universitasnya dan membeli kamera tua karena Hikari sangat menyukai fotografi. Namun ternyata, kamera itu juga memiliki rahasia yang akan membuatnya terlibat dalam segala macam situasi "menarik" dan "canggung" terutama dengan Botan Oshikiri, senpai dan rekan kerjanya. Bagaimana kehidupan Kyosuke mulai dari sekarang?
description.ru:
Провалившись на вступительных экзаменах в университет, Кагами Кёскэ также потерял возможность сблизиться со своей школьной любовью — Кодзё Хикари. Надеясь сохранить с ней связь, он не только устраивается работать в кафе рядом с её кампусом, но и покупает подержанный полароид, чтобы найти общую тему для разговоров с увлекающейся искусством фотографии Хикари. Однако Кагами не знал, что он приобрел очень необычный фотоаппарат…  


---

description.en:
WARNING: NTR IN LATER CHAPTER

Niwa Tasuku working at Sanden Printing Company for 2 years now but still can't get along at all with with Yukino Tsumugi, a female colleague at the DTP department. Their colleagues try to 'break the ice' by inviting them out for drinks but later that night, they ended up in a love hotel. A strange "connection" is made between these two, one that would 'link' them during the most private thoughts and moments!
description.ru: Нива Тасуку работает в полиграфической компании «Sanden» уже 2 года, но до сих пор не может поладить с Юкино Цумуги из издательского отдела. Коллеги пытаются сблизить их, пригласив выпить, но этой же ночью они оказываются в любовном отеле. Между ними возникает странная «связь», которая «соединяет» их в самые интимные моменты!
description.es-la: Niwa Tasuku ha trabajado en Sanden Printing Company durante 2 años, pero todavía no puede llevarse bien con Yukino Tsumugi, una colega del departamento de DTP. Sus compañeros intentan "romper el hielo" invitándolos a tomar unas copas, pero más tarde esa noche, terminaron en un motel. Se hace una extraña "conexión" entre estos dos, ¡una que los 'vincularía' durante los pensamientos y en los momentos más privados!

description.en: A super-powerful guy keeps defeating everyone around him, even though he doesn't like fighting.

title.en: They Say There's a Ghost in the Club Room

description.en:
I met a friend who disappeared a few years ago, and it turns out he's now an exorcist?!

Jisang often speaks nonsense or acts dangerously out of nowhere, and sometimes experiences memory lapses. His friend and underclassman, Taeju, shares a concern that he has: When the club members enter the club room, they fall victim to strange phenomena.

Believing it to be the work of a ghost, Taeju calls an occult specialist to resolve the situation. Unexpectedly, the specialist turns out to be Jisang's childhood friend, Ham Leerae.

Jisang then learns that his symptoms weren't due to an illness, but were caused by spiritual possession. Determined to keep Leerae around, Jisang offers his body to assist with exorcism requests.

"That's how I can make you stay. So you can't escape now."

And the solution to free him from possession is...kissing?!
description.ko:
몇 년 전 사라져버린 친구를 다시 만났다. 그것도 퇴마사로..?! 

갑자기 이상한 말을 하거나 위험한 행동을 하면서 기억이 끊기는 증세가 있던 지상.
그에게 친한 대학후배 태주가 고민을 얘기한다. 동아리 회원들이 동아리방에만 오면 이상증세를 보인다는 것. 
귀신이 원인이라고 생각한 태주는 문제해결을 위해 영능력자를 부른다. 
그러나 나타난 영능력자는 뜻밖에 지상의 옛 친구 함이레였는데.. 
지상은 자신의 이상증상이 병이 아니라 빙의 때문임을 알게 되고, 이레를 붙잡아두기 위해 자신의 몸을 이용해 의뢰를 돕기로 한다. 
"그래야 네가 계속 여기 있을 거 아냐. 넌 이제 도망 못 간다는 뜻이지." 
그런데 빙의를 푸는 방법이.. 키스라고...?!

description.en: Orphaned at a young age, and barely scraping by, Baek Hoyeon. After ghosts have been finding their way to Hoyeon, night after night tormenting him, he eventually goes to see a shaman. He is shocked after being told that 100 ghosts are haunting him. With his life on the line, he has only one choice! “…You have to do it with each of them. That is your only solution.” The only way to survive is to have sex with the ghosts! All 100 of them!! And then he meets Choi Dan, someone in a similar position as him. They come to an agreement; Choi Dan will become the vessel for the ghosts and vanquish them together. With the thought of wanting to live to see another day, the two will have to spend 100 nights together…

The day 'Daeun' went with his classmates to drink like crazy, he then went home to sleep. In his dreams, he recalls a memory of when him and ‘Seohjin’ met lips. Why did the 'mistake' he made in high school suddenly reveal itself in a dream? Daeun, who thought his feelings had finally come to rest, Encounters Seohjin, whom he's uncomfortable with. Unlike his usual self, Daeun seeks out Seohjin to ask if he made some kind of mistake while drinking, but the answer he's met with is that they just kissed...?

altTitles.ja: あかね噺

description.en: Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical entertainment. Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane will take her own steps into this unique world!
description.fr:
Shinta s'est perfectionné 13 ans durant afin d'atteindre le statut de Shin'uchi, le plus haut rang des rakugo-ka. Mais malgré sa très bonne performance lors de l'examen de passage, le juge de l'épreuve, l'émérite Maître Arakawa Issho, a décidé de renvoyer de l'école Arakawa l'ensemble des participants sans donner davantage d'explication ! Ainsi s'arrêta nette la carrière de Shinta, qui avait tant sacrifié pour accomplir son rêve…
Mais Akane, la fille de Shinta qui admirait son père et son rakugo plus que tout, ne compte pas en rester là !
description.th:
ที่สุดแห่งศิลปะการเล่าเรื่องที่ใช้ผู้แสดงเพียงหนึ่งคนและเรื่องเล่าเพียงหนึ่งเรื่อง --- "ราคุโกะ" นักราคุโกะ อาราคาวะ ชินตะและอาคาเนะลูกสาวของเขาต่างก็หลงเสน่ห์ของความบันเทิงอันสุดแสนจะเรียบง่ายนี้ ในวันที่ชินตะขึ้นเวทีแสดงในการสอบเลื่อนชั้นเป็นชินอุจิ อาคาเนะเองก็ได้ชมการแสดงนั้นอยู่และเส้นทางของนักราคุโกะที่อาคาเนะตัดสินใจก้าวเดินไปก็คือ---- มังงะราคุโกะขนานแท้ที่เหล่านักราคุโกะล้วนมาประชันฝีมือฟาดฟันกันได้เปิดฉากขึ้นแล้ว!

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br: Rakugo - a forma perfeita de contar histórias, na qual tudo na história é expresso apenas com seu corpo e palavras. Shinta e sua filha, Akane, foram seduzidos por essa maravilhosa forma clássica de entretenimento. Observando seu pai treinar para passar no teste de Shin’uchi, Akane avança neste mundo único.

description.en: In 2011, childhood friends Yasuho Hirose and Joushuu Higashikata discover a naked man buried in the ground just outside the town of Morioh. The man has no memory of his name or previous life; the only thing he remembers about himself is how to use his Stand, a supernatural ability that takes the form of a humanoid creature. The stranger is quickly given a name, Jousuke, and Joushuu's father Norisuke decides to adopt him into the Higashikata household until he can find his own home.  As Jousuke begins to investigate his past, it becomes apparent that he is no ordinary amnesiac. There is much more to his identity than he first suspected, and, as he is thrust into a series of high-stakes Stand battles, he soon begins unravelling a deadly conspiracy that encompasses the entire town.
description.hu:
A Jojo no Kimyou na Bouken sorozat nyolcadik történetíve.

A nagy japán földrengést követően Morioh-t hatalmas földkiugrások sújtották, ahogy helyiek nevezik, Szemes falak. A vizsgálat ellenére a szakmai becslések üresen maradtak. Eközben egy fiatal lány, Yasuho Hirose egy férfit talál a földbe temetve,aki jellegzetes csillagalakú anyajeggyel és mélyre hatoló harapásnyomokkal rendelkezik. A férfit, aki az aminézia jeleit mutatja, egy helyi család hozta ide és adta neki a Josuke Higashikata nevet, azonban a különös események nem maradnak abba, egyik a másikat halmozza leginkább és hamarosan a standként ismert talány előbukkan, hogy eloszlassa a zavarságok felhőit. 

- 2013-ban a 17-dik Japan Media Arts Festivalon megnyerte a fődíjat a manga kategóriában.
description.pl:
Ósma część serii JoJo's Bizarre Adventure. 
Począwszy od trzęsień ziemi w 2011, w miasteczku Morioh zaczęły występować rozległe uskoki, nazwane Murami Oczu. Pomimo przeprowadzonych badań, przyczyna ich wzniesienia pozostaje nieznana. W międzyczasie młoda dziewczyna imieniem Yasuho Hirose znajduje zakopanego mężczyznę ze znamieniem w kształcie gwiazdy otoczonym śladami ugryzienia. Mężczyzna przyjąwszy łatkę człowieka z amnezją, został przyjęty do mieszkającej w pobliżu rodziny oraz nadano mu imię - Jōsuke Higashikata. Jednakże, tajemnicze wydarzenia wcale nie ustają, a zagadkowe Standy dopełniają poczucie zdezorientowania.
- Czarno-biała wersja wygrała główną nagrodę w kategorii mangi w 17 edycji Japońskiego Festiwalu Sztuki w 2013 roku.
description.es-la:
El arco de la octava historia de la serie: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.

Tras el gran terremoto del este en Japón, Morioh ha sido golpeado por grandes protuberancias de tierra conocidas por los lugareños como Los Muros con Ojos. A pesar de la investigación, las estimaciones profesionales quedan vacías. Mientras tanto, la joven Yasuho Hirose, descubre a un hombre enterrado en la tierra, este posee una distintiva marca de nacimiento en forma de estrella junto con marcas de mordeduras profundas. El hombre, que ha contraído un caso básico de amnesia, es acogido por una familia local y recibe el nombre de Jousuke Higashikata, sin embargo, los eventos misteriosos no pueden evitar que se acumulen unos sobre otros y pronto ese enigma conocido como "stand", emerge para complementar la gran nube de confusión.

° Ganó el Gran Premio en la categoría de manga en el 17º Festival de Artes de Medios de Japón en 2013.

description.en:
Each time a Demon Lord has appeared, a human hero has slain it, pushing back the demons in the dark lands. 
As the cycle starts over again, a mysterious ancient hero called Ramia reappears. Meanwhile, an abnormal Demon army suddenly strikes the kingdom…
description.fr:
L'histoire fantastique de l'excentrique et mystérieuse héroïne Ramia et des démons qui s'opposent à elle.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/TheGoldenSmurf)  
- [Author's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/10669208)  
- [Author's Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/thegoldensmurf)
description.id:
Setiap kali seorang Raja Iblis memunculkan diri, seorang bahadur manusia telah tampak ’tuk menakluknya, mendorong mundur para iblis ke negeri gulita.
Dengan mulainya lagi daurnya, seorang bahadur kuno misterius bernama Ramia muncul kembali. Sementara itu, sebuah laskar Iblis taknormal tiba-tiba menyerang kerajaannya...
description.ru: Фэнтезийный эпос, посвященный необычному и таинственному герою по имени Рамия.
description.tr:
Ne zaman bir İblis Lordu ortaya çıksa, bir insan kahraman onu öldürerek karanlık topraklardaki iblisleri geri püskürtmüştür.
Döngü yeniden başlarken, Ramia adında gizemli bir antik kahraman yeniden ortaya çıkar. Bu sırada, anormal bir İblis ordusu aniden krallığa saldırır...
description.es-la:
Cada vez que aparecía un Lord de los Demonios, un héroe humano lo eliminaba, haciendo retroceder a los demonios a las tierras oscuras.
Mientras el ciclo empieza una vez más, una antigua y misteriosa heroína llamada Ramia reaparece. Y mientras tanto, un ejército anormal de Demonios azota repentinamente al reino...

If the Villainess and the Villain Were to Meet and Fall in Love: It Seems the Shunned Heroine Who Formed a Contract With an Unnamed Spirit Is Fighting With the Nobleman Yet Again

description.en:
Despite being from a prestigious noble family, Bridget, a failed daughter who made a contract with the weakest spirit, one day had her engagement broken off by the third prince, Joseph.

However, no one sympathized with her, who was acting as a proud daughter at the behest of Joseph... At that time, Bridget meets the Duke's son Yuri, who is feared by those around him because of his overwhelming ability and cold personality.

Two people who hate each other and repel each other. However, the encounter gradually changes their destinies. This is the story of a villainess who is despised for being incompetent and a villain who is shunned for being a genius who eventually fall in love.

---
Despite her noble status, Brigitte contracts with the weakest type of spirit—and on that very same day, the prince publicly breaks off their engagement. No one shows much sympathy towards the once haughty young lady—except for the duke's son, Yuri, who attends the same magic academy. Yuri is feared for his incredible abilities and icy personality, but with him on her side, her fortunes might have changed…

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700426830814673), [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9923hb/)
description.ja: 幼い頃に最弱精霊と契約してしまった落ちこぼれ令嬢ブリジット。ある日、第三王子から婚約破棄を言い渡され、絶望の淵に立たされる。そんな中、彼女は孤高の天才令息ユーリと遭遇する。嫌われ者同士いがみ合う二人であったが、この出逢いが運命を動かすこととなり――。

altTitles.ja: 無口な宮下さんの色欲チャンネル

altTitles.th: แชนแนลสุดกามของคุณมิยาชิตะผู้เงียบขรึม

description.en:
Kei Sakai, a high school boy, had a problem. One thing led to another, and he was deeply uninterested in everything and had no sexual desire.

Then one day, he learns of a mysterious, beautiful girl named Yami, who is the talk of the town on SNS, from a fellow part-timer. Yami is an unidentified internet idol who uploads naughty videos and pictures of herself in outrageous outfits, and has a huge following among men. No one knows her real face, but Sakai recognizes a woman who resembles Yami. That person was Saki Miyashita. Saki Miyashita is a high school girl who sits next to Yami in the same class, and although she is far more plain than Yami, she shares Yami's style and the position of her crying moles.

Sakai, who had lost interest and sexual desire, decides to explore Miyashita with an onlooker's guts in order to find out Yami's true identity. However, unaware of Miyashita's trap, they end up sharing a lewd secret that is too bad ......!?
description.id: Kei Sakai, seorang anak SMA, yang bermasalah. dia tidak terlalu tertarik pada apa pun dan tidak memiliki hasrat seksual. Suatu hari, dia mengetahui tentang keberadaan seorang gadis cantik misterius, Yami, yang menjadi topik hangat di SNS dari seorang teman kerja paruh waktunya.  Yami idola tak dikenal di dunia internet yang mendapat dukungan luar biasa dari para pria dengan mengunggah video dan gambar nakal yang terlihat terlalu konyol. Tidak ada yang tahu wajah depannya… Namun, hanya Sakai yang ingat seorang wanita yang mirip Yami.  Orang itu adalah Saki Miyashita.  Seorang gadis SMA  pendiam yang duduk disebelahnya di kelas yang sama, tetapi posisi Yami, gayanya adalah sama. Sakai telah kehilangan minat dan hasrat seksual, tetapi untuk mengetahui identitas sebenarnya dari Yami, ia memutuskan untuk mencari Miyashita. Namun, tanpa mengetahui jebakan Miyashita, dia akan membagikan rahasia keji yang terlalu berbahaya...!!?
description.ja: 俺だけが知ってる彼女の本性（ヒミツ）。禁断のインモラル撮影日記。地味だけどスタイル抜群のクラスメイト宮下咲は、えっちな投稿でSNSで人気沸騰中のネットアイドルだった！彼女の正体を知ってしまい撮影を手伝うことになった酒井は、彼女の淫靡で好色な魔性の虜になっていく・・・・・・。
description.th: ซาคาอิ เคย์ เป็นหนุ่ม ม.ปลาย ที่เบื่อโลกขั้นสุด เขาได้แต่ภาวนาให้มีเรื่องน่าตื่นเต้นเกิดขึ้นบ้าง จนกระทั่งวันหนึ่งที่เขาได้พบกับแชนแนลสุดกาม แต่ภาพที่ปรากฏอยู่บนนั้น ดันละม้ายคล้ายคลึงกับเพื่อนร่วมชั้นสุดขรึม(และอึ๋ม)ของเขาซะได้!

description.en:
Xue Tao had to face the harsh reality that his father passed away from a mysterious illness, which left his mother shaken. To clarify the cause of his father's death and ensure his survival, Xue Tao volunteered to enter the “music registration” to get more information. Xue Tao's wit and creativity made her move with ease among powerful people of all colors.

But then her friend Zhi Nian became the first “victim” in the exchange of power in the land of Shu! She deeply realized that with her little identity as a courtesan, she was not able to unravel the plot behind the deaths of her family and friends. At this moment, Xue Tao had an opportunity: with her skill and poetry as bargaining chips, she won the esteem of the new military governor Wei Gao.

From then on, she officially entered the power core of the land of Shu, facing the forces from all sides that were making waves… However, as she cautiously went through a series of power conflicts, what awaited her in the end was the difficult decision between 'survive' and 'truth'...

description.en:
"Won't I be able to get filthy rich if I use this skill?"  
  
Continually exploited at work, Amata Shirou quits his job and moves to his grandma's house. When he finds out that it's connected to another world, he comes up with a plan to set up a business selling Japanese goods.   
  
The story of a man getting rich using his skill that converts the currency of the other world to Japanese yen and so forth.

description.en:
I drew a lottery at the Shopping District and won the privilege to go to another world. After drawing a lot of balls, unexpectedly I got a cheat-like skill. Silencing those who are noisy and getting hold of all the things that I want. I will satisfy all my desires.  


---
description.ja: 福引で特賞を引き当てた少年・結城カケル。彼が受け取ったのは“異世界転移”と“あらゆる能力が777倍”になる権利だった!?
description.pt:
Um virgem que ganha na loteria e como prêmio pode ir para outro mundo e escolher seu poder.  


---

  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Bookwalker)](https://bookwalker.jp/de3a938b85-e9d2-4f4d-9161-49b2f44782a3/)
description.pt-br:
Ganhei na loteria do Shopping District o privilégio de ir para outro mundo.  

Depois de sortear várias bolas, inesperadamente ganhei uma habilidade semelhante a uma trapaça. Com esse poder, satisfarei todos os meus desejos e terei o meu próprio harem!

title.en: How to Survive as a Maid in a Horror Game

altTitles.en: Surviving as a Maid in a Horror Game

description.en:
"How did you know? I hid it well so that no one would find out."
 
Adrian Caesar von de Paltzgraf, the successor to the Paltzgraf Family. He is hailed as an angel in this world, but only I knew that the serial murders and murder attempts happening in the area which everyone was talking about were all committed by a young, good-looking gentleman.

[Adrian's murderous intent has increased.]
[Convince Adrian to lower his murderous intent. If not, you die.]
[Adrian's murderous intent is at 92%.]

I am the only one who knows. I was the only one who transmigrated into the world of this ridiculous horror game.

---

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

altTitles.ja: パンプキンナイト

description.en: After escaping from a mental institution, a girl with a self-inflicted facial deformity enacts twisted justice on those who mistreated her, face hidden underneath the disguise of a pumpkin.
description.es: Una deforme chica sale con una calabaza en su cabeza para matar a todos aquellos que la acosaron en su pasado después de escapar de un manicomio.
description.fr: Victime de sévices orchestrés aux yeux de tous par ses camarades de classe, une collégienne a été interné dans un hôpital psychiatrique. Plusieurs mois plus tard, alors que ses bourreaux sont aujourd’hui au lycée, ils apprennent qu’elle s’est échappée en tuant tout le personnel hospitalier qui a tenté de lui barrer la route et qu’elle est bien décidé à se venger d’eux.
description.ja: ある日、女子高生・中谷明日美は、SNSで「パンプキンナイト」という見知らぬアカウントからフォローされる。 『中谷明日美コロス』というメッセージが届いた直後、カボチャのマスクを被った殺人鬼に襲われ惨死する。 そして偶然、明日美と通話していた和也にも死の宣告が突きつけられ……。
description.kk: Бет әлпеті қатты зақымданған, оқушы қыз, бұрын оны келеке еткен адамдардың жандарын алу үшін, ауруханадан қашып шығады.
description.pt: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que a maltrataram no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.
description.pt-br: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que fizeram bullying com ela no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.

altTitles.ja: 月のしっぽ

description.en:
Usagi is the granddaughter of the leader of a prestigious ninja village, but she's such a klutz that she's never made it out of the lower class. Frustrated with Usagi's lack of progress, her grandfather sends her to marry Lord Hanzo with an order to breed many ninja children. But the lord has no interest in her or her childbearing potential!

The last volume includes Promise of the Moon.

Related Series:
Ran to Aoi (Spin-Off)
Tsuki no Toiki Ai no Kizu (Prequel)

altTitles.pt-br: Garota Delinquente Do Ensino Médio KuzuHana-chan

description.en:
At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! 

While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone.

Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
description.fr:
Au début de l'année scolaire, Saotome Hodaka intègre le lycée préfectoral de Moteshiro, ancien établissement réservé aux filles et récemment devenu mixte. Il découvre rapidement que le ratio garçons/filles est de 1:359 !

Bien que cela puisse sembler être un paradis pour certains, la majorité des élèves sont des délinquantes, et Saotome se retrouve aussitôt extorqué par certaines des filles les plus agressives. Par chance, il est sauvé malgré lui par Hanako Kuzuryu, une belle délinquante qui aspire seulement à être laissée en paix.

Est-ce le début d'une nouvelle amitié ? Comment la vie de Saotome évoluera-t-elle dans une école pleine de filles turbulentes ?
description.ja:
男女比率1対359!!　359人の女子高生にいじられまくり!!　つらたんハーレム学園ラブコメ!!　コワかわ最強ヒロイン爆誕!!
四方八方ギャルだらけな県立茂手城高校に入学した黒一点・早乙女穂高は、ヤンキーJK・九頭竜華子にピンチを救われて…!?
description.pt-br:
Uma proporção de homem para mulher de 1:359?!

Saotome-kun é admitido em uma escola cheia de gyarus e conhece uma garota delinqüente chamada Hanako Kuzuryu.

altTitles.ja: 帝乃三姉妹は案外、チョロい。

altTitles.zh-hk: 帝乃三姊妹意外的好對付。

altTitles.zh: 帝乃三姐妹原来很好搞定

altTitles.id: Kakak beradik Mikadono ternyata sangat mudah ditangani.

description.en: Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!
description.id: Meskipun Ayase Yuu adalah putra seorang aktris terkenal dan berbakat, dia berada di bawah rata-rata dalam segala hal yang dia lakukan. Dia dipercaya untuk hidup di bawah asuhan teman ibunya, dan kemudian mengetahui bahwa dia juga akan sekamar dengan tiga saudara perempuan dari sekolahnya yang memiliki kecantikan dan bakat. Meskipun Yuu berpikir bahwa pemahaman tidak mungkin dicapai antara orang biasa dan mereka yang diberkati dengan bakat, ketiga saudara perempuan itu secara mengejutkan...?!
description.ja:
孤高の天才三姉妹と同居することになったちょっとポンコツめな高校生・優。平凡以下な彼が三姉妹に振り回されると思いきや…この三姉妹、案外、チョロい――？

優との生活で変わっていく三姉妹の心模様。才色兼備の三姉妹が動揺、狼狽、そしてときめく…
description.pt-br: Embora Ayase Yuu seja filho de uma atriz renomada e talentosa, ele está abaixo da média em tudo o que faz. Ele é encarregado de viver sob os cuidados de um amigo de sua mãe, e mais tarde descobre que também vai morar com as três irmãs de sua escola que possuem beleza e talento. Embora Yuu pensasse que um entendimento seria impossível de alcançar entre uma pessoa comum e aqueles abençoados com talento, as três irmãs são surpreendentemente...?!

title.en: Kono Ai wo Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.ja: この愛を終わらせてくれないか
Kono Ai o Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.zh: 能让这份爱画上休止符吗

description.en: Yuzu is Hayami Madoka's ardent fan. Having no friends or family that care for her, Madoka is her only solace. Being that Sachiko is Madoka's best friend, she is Yuzu's most hated existence. To vent, she opens a secret account where she posts malicious comments about Sachiko. When she discovers this, she instead attempts to befriend Yuzu and offers her a chance to talk to Madoka. However, an accident occurs and they end up switching bodies with Sachiko being left in coma.

Tensei Saki ga Zannen Ouji Datta Ken: Ima wa Fukkin Ikkai mo Dekinai kedo Yasete Isekai Sukuimasu

description.en:
A young man who gets into a plane crash while returning from a business trip overseas is reincarnated into another world after being asked by the goddess to defeat the evil god.   
  
However, he was reincarnated as a stupid prince who is known among the aristocrats as the "Pig Prince (Orc Prince)" because of his fat and ugly appearance. If you can't even do one sit-up, how are you going to defeat the evil god? This is the story of the Pig Prince's struggle to lose weight!  
  


---
description.id:
Seorang pemuda yang mengalami kecelakaan pesawat saat pulang dari perjalan binis di luar negeri direinkarnasi ke dunia lain setelah diminta oleh dewi untuk mengalahkan dewa jahat.   
  
Akan tetapi, ia tereinkarnasi sebagai seorang pangeran bodoh. yang terkenal di kalangan ningrat dengan julukan "Pangeran Orc/Pangeran Babi" karena penampilannya yang gendut dan jelek. Sit-up saja tidak bisa, apalagi mengalahkan dewa jahat? Inilah kisah perjuangan si Pangeran Babi dalam menurunkan berat badan!

title.en: My Trainee Teacher Is Actually a Goth Rocker

altTitles.vi: Cô giáo thực tập của tôi thực ra là 1 Goth Rocker
